definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: As a water sign, it's only natural that Pisces finds comfort in liquids.
sentences.chinese: 既然是水相星座，魚兒的生活自然是和水分不開了。

sentences.english: Owing to the low oil content of soybean, enzymatic aqueous extraction of soybean oil is difficult.
sentences.chinese: 大豆含油量較低，酶法水相提油困難。

sentences.english: This is mainly due permeation of aqueous phase with the protein molecule.
sentences.chinese: 那是水相的重要拜託滲出進程與卵黑量分子的。

sentences.english: As a Cancer, a Cardinal Water Sign, you love to care for the downtrodden and very often your own needs are overlooked.
sentences.chinese: 水相星座的蟹子經常忽略自己的真正需求。

sentences.english: Water and earth may be emotional and nurturing or down to earth and practical.
sentences.chinese: 水相和土相則可能培育情感或切實的付諸實際行動。

sentences.english: The asymmetric reduction of OPBE catalyzed by Baker Yeast in water medium to synthesis HPBE was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對面包酵母水相催化不對稱還原OPBE進行研究。

sentences.english: Combine the two aqueous phases and extract them once more with unbuffered phenol.
sentences.chinese: 將兩個水相混合並用不含緩衝液的苯酚抽提數次。

definition: to agree implicitly/of one mind/views coincide without a word exchanged
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Heshui county in Qingyang 慶陽|庆阳[Qing4 yang2], Gansu
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
fast matchmaking/speed dating/(coll.) (Tw) (of a couple) to be a good match
lunar apogee (point in the moon's orbit furthest from earth)/imaginary heavenly body occupying the second focus of the moon's elliptic orbit/dark moon/Lilith
